_header: A Sexton was in an Abbey / Of the Order of Monks grey
Subjects: Virgin Mary, miracles of; monks, tales of
_description: The Incontinent Monk drowned, a miracle of the Virgin — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A Sexteyn was in an AbbeyOf þe Ordre of Monkes
                    grey…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Gret wonder þei hedden hem amongWhi þe sexteyn was
                    so long…
BodEngPoeta1.Note: 4 lines; ends imperfectly due to loss of fols. 127-166.
